attributes.action: Save the Edinburgh legal graffiti boards...
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There are only one set of legal boards to paint graffiti in Edinburgh and they are going to knock them down. The council complain about the amount of illegal graffiti and yet they are going to knock down the ONLY legal painting spot - it makes no sense!!!

rejection.details: We believe this would be a matter for the local council and the Scottish Executive.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
